scripts.dev: uv run --group dev python -m watchdog.watchmedo auto-restart --pattern '*.py' --recursive --signal SIGTERM -- uv run python -m sqlrooms.server
scripts.dev:sync: uv run --group dev python -m watchdog.watchmedo auto-restart --pattern '*.py' --recursive --signal SIGTERM -- uv run python -m sqlrooms.server --sync
scripts.prerelease: uv run pytest && uv run ruff check && uv run ruff format --check
scripts.release: pnpm run build && uvx twine upload --skip-existing ../dist/sqlrooms_server*
